name: Gravity Oddity
description:
A Roguelike Space Adventure with an Epic Twist

Across the galaxy, gravitational fields are weakening, causing planets to implode. Good thing the boys and girls at the Rio Grande Corporation came up with gravity boots. With them, traversing surfaces on every planet is a walk in the park.


All is well until the corporation kidnaps your roommate, Gary. Your rent isn’t going to pay itself, so you just have to go after him. With your new sidekick, Newton, you go on a one-man rescue mission to uncover the mysteries of your roommate’s disappearance and what lies beneath the Rio Grande Corporation.

Battle your way through ever-changing galactic environments on your jetpack and gravity boots and get Gary back in this exciting space action adventure!

Please Wishlist if you're interested!

Wishlisting the game greatly improves the game's chances of doing well on Steam. So if you're interested or played the free demo and liked it, please please please consider wishlisting. It really makes a huge difference :)

Defy Gravity and Walk on Any Surface



Lace up your gravity boots and grab your teleport gun as you blast through bosses and enemies across various levels and environments. With Newton by your side, walk on any surface and fly through gaps using your jetpack.

Go through hordes of enemies using your teleport gun as you all in to rescue your roommate from the clutches of the Rio Grande Corporation.

Only you stand in the way of whatever evil the Rio Grande Corporation has for the universe and the rest of its inhabitants!

Tweak Your Arsenal and Save the Universe (and Gary, of course)!



Get on your workbench and turn your teleport gun into the ultimate universe-saving weapon with mods. Mods are scattered all across the galaxy, each one giving your teleport gun a meaner punch.

Multiply your teleport gun’s stopping power with splitting rounds. Add some bounce to your shots with bouncing rounds. It’s all up to you!

With a plethora of modifiers to choose from, you can create an arsenal of skills that match your style of play.

If you’re going to save your roommate Gary, there’s no better way to do it than your way!

Shoot’em then Loot’em

You battle your way towards saving your roommate across multiple levels filled with various enemies from many parts of the universe. As you go through each level and opponent, special items, modifiers for your teleport gun, and loot await you.


Use everything you’ve found to get Gary back and stop the Rio Grande Corporation.

Save Gary and the Universe in Style

You can customize your avatar and leave a lasting impression on enemies before you pull the trigger. And if you’re not happy with how Newton looks, you’re free to style your sidekick in any way you see fit.


Don’t just save the universe and your roommate. Do it your way and in style!

Main Features

  • 130 mods with crazy synergies to make you feel OP
  • Intense boss battles to keep you on the edge of your seat
  • Ever-changing levels created to challenge and engage you
  • Customize your avatar and your sidekick the way you want with almost 100 cosmetic elements
